careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.subtitle: We’re always looking for passionate people to join our growing family.
careers.general: Don't see a position that fits?

returns.title: Return Policy
returns.intro: Your satisfaction is important to us. You can return items within 14 days of receiving them.
conditions: Items must be unused and in perfect condition.

shipping.title: Shipping Information
shipping.delivery: We offer fast and secure delivery across the UAE.
shipping.tracking: You will receive a tracking link via email once your order is shipped.

sizeGuide.title: Size Guide
sizeGuide.description: Use this chart to help determine your correct size.

contactus.title: Contact Us
contactus.name: Name
contactus.successMessage: Your message has been successfully sent. We will get back to you soon!

questions.q: How can I track my order?
questions.a: Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking link via email.

questions.q: Can I change my order after placing it?
questions.a: Yes, within 1–2 hours of placing the order. Please contact us immediately.

questions.q: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.a: We accept credit cards and cash on delivery within the UAE.
Currently, we only ship within the United Arab Emirates.

1.title: Best E-Commerce Brand in UAE
1.description: Recognized for design, speed, and innovation in regional awards.

2.title: New Partnership with FedEx UAE
2.description: We're proud to offer faster, tracked deliveries across all Emirates.

3.title: Launch of Sustainable Fashion Line
3.description: Eco-conscious collections now available with global shipping.

sustainability.title: Our Commitment to Sustainability
sustainability.description: We believe in responsible fashion, eco-conscious materials, and community-driven impact.

values.title: Eco-Friendly Materials
values.description: All our products use organic cotton, recycled fabrics, and low-impact dyes.

values.title: Waste Reduction
values.description: We minimize production waste through efficient cutting and repurposing.

values.title: Global Impact
values.description: We support carbon-neutral shipping and offset environmental footprints.

values.title: Fair Trade
values.description: Ethical labor practices and community partnerships are our foundation.

privacy.title: Privacy & Data Protection
privacy.description: We are committed to protecting your personal data and being transparent about how we use it.

sections.title: Your Data is Secure
sections.description: We use encryption and industry best practices to keep your information safe and private.

sections.title: No Data Sold
sections.description: We never sell or rent your personal data to third parties, ever.

sections.title: Full Transparency
sections.description: You can view, edit, or delete your data at any time via your account settings.

sections.title: Global Compliance
sections.description: We comply with GDPR, CCPA, and other global privacy regulations.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: By using our website, you agree to comply with our terms and policies outlined here.

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.description: You agree not to misuse the website or services, and not to violate any laws.

account.title: User Accounts
account.description: You're responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and activity.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.description: We are not liable for indirect or incidental damages arising from your use of our services.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These terms are governed by the laws of the UAE, without regard to conflict of law principles.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files stored on your device to help websites function efficiently and provide personalized experiences.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.description: We use cookies to enhance user experience, analyze traffic, and remember your preferences.

typesOfCookies.title: Types of Cookies We Use
typesOfCookies.description: We use essential, performance, functionality, and targeting cookies to deliver a tailored browsing experience.

yourChoices.title: Your Choices
yourChoices.description: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings or our cookie consent tool.

changesToPolicy.title: Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.description: We may update this policy periodically. Any changes will be posted on this page with a revised date.

commitment.title: Accessibility Commitment
commitment.description: We are dedicated to ensuring digital accessibility for everyone, including individuals with disabilities.

inclusiveDesign.title: Inclusive Design
inclusiveDesign.description: Our platform is designed to be inclusive from the ground up, considering a wide range of user needs and preferences.

assistiveTech.title: Support for Assistive Technologies
assistiveTech.description: We support screen readers, keyboard navigation, and other assistive tools to improve user experience.

ongoingImprovements.title: Ongoing Improvements
ongoingImprovements.description: Accessibility is a continuous process. We regularly test and update our site to ensure compliance and usability.

contactSupport.title: Contact Support
contactSupport.description: Need help? Reach out to our support team for any accessibility-related issues or feedback.

footer.description: Premium fashion for the modern lifestyle. Discover our curated collection of luxury clothing and accessories.

wholesale.pageDescription: Exclusive bulk pricing for registered wholesale customers. MOQ applies.
wholesale.seoDescription: Explore UAE wholesale opportunities for retailers. Bulk ordering, competitive pricing, and premium fashion collections for your business.

perks.bulkPricingDesc: Save up to 40% on MOQ orders

wholesale.customSolutionsDesc: Contact our team for large orders, brand collaborations, or tailored pricing plans.
